additionalInformation: Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of Boots of Speed-based items do not stack.

name: Arcane Boots
description: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.
trivia: Arcane Boots was originally created as Arcane Ring, being built out of Ring of Protection, Energy Booster, and a recipe. Its recipe got changed and its theme reworked into Arcane Boots in the 6.68 gameplay patch. Arcane Ring's appearance is designed after this as well, sharing aesthetics with Arcane Boots.

tips: If the player drops items which provides a large amount of mana (e.g. Bloodstone or Eye of Skadi), then uses Arcane Boots, and then picks up the dropped items again, the player will overall gain far more than 160 mana. This is because upon dropping the mana granting items, the player's maximum mana drops while the current mana percentage stays the same, but Arcane Boots still gives the full amount. After picking up the items again, its maximum mana raises, and its current mana percentage stays the same.
